text.title: Two slain in knife attack at Swedish IKEA furniture retailer
text.head: Two slain in knife attack at Swedish IKEA furniture retailer
Sources

list.item: Ann-Sofie Sannemalm, Yngve Fredriksson, Joakim Zakariasen. "Mor och son offer för vansinnesdåd" — Vestmanlands Läns Tidning , August 10, 2015 «[ create sv language template]»
Erik Grönlund. "Polisen om dådet på Ikea: ”En galen händelse”" — Sveriges Television , August 10, 2015 «[ create sv language template]»
Simon Johnson and Daniel Dickson, Reuters. "Two killed in knife attack at IKEA in Sweden; two arrested" — Yahoo! News , August 10, 2015
"Swedish Ikea knife attack in Vasteras leaves two dead" — BBC News Online , August 10, 2015
